name: SayGoodbye
0:
”Alexa open say goodbye.”
”Alexa launch say goodbye.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say goodbye
des:
Alexa will say goodbye to you!

Not only will Alexa say "goodbye," but she will say it in a variety of interesting ways. From cheerful departures to slightly humorous send-offs. This skill has a variety of "goodbye" sayings to suit every situation!

To use, simply say, "Alexa, open Say Goodbye!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
